idea: Arugula&Co. is a health food startup, built on the story of unique Indian ingredients. Our first range of products,  salad dressings, comes in five flavours. Our products have zero additives or preservatives, no refined sugar, no refined oils and are sustainably sourced and packaged. We currently have a 6 month shelf life at ambient temperatures and distribute primarily through e-commerce channels (aggregators and our own website) as well as ~30 stores across India. We intend on building the business through product expansion, e-commerce, and export.
name: Arugula&Co.

idea: We, Hipoteca Financial Services Private Limited, a company situated in Mumbai, Maharashtra, India are engaged in the business of providing outsourcing services to various banks and financial institutions in United States of America and to serve our clients situated therein.

idea:
“Online Diesel Booking and delivery at customers door step”, a commitment and innovative door to door Diesel delivery service of Kalyan Bio Oil Private Limited. Kalyan Bio Oil providing door step Diesel delivery service at Thane and running this operation presently at bootstrapped position with self-funded.

Founded by Mr Amol Lahanu Muke and Kanchan Amol Muke, who are from existing fuel business. Since the approval of Govt to supply HSD ( High Speed Diesel) at door step of customers, Mr Amol Lahanu Muke and Kanchan Amol Muke, has made up mind to grab the market with easy reachable through mobile vans dispensers.


How the system works?

To avail the service, one needs purchase minimum 100 litre diesel. Once the order is placed, the fuel delivery van will reach at customer’s location with all the necessary information about the customer, i.e, name, phone number, quantity required, address and time slot of the delivery. The customer will receive a notification message before the fuel truck reach the location. They can make payment both offline and online. No delivery or transportation cost will be charged as extra and customer gets diesel at same price a petrol pump charges.
name: KALYAN BIO OIL PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
hat is a SIEM?
A SIEM (Security Information and Event Management) system is a tool used for centralised storage and interpretation of important security data. A SIEM system is the combination of the SEM and SIM systems:

SEM (Security Event Management) provides a real-time monitoring capability, event correlation, notifications and console views.
SIM (Security Information Management) includes the set of capabilities for long-term storage, analysis and presentation of registration information.
name: Xids

idea: This is a unique online service providing consultancy company.
name: SK Enterprises

idea:
Envesto is a productive content creation and investment platform. People can create learning free and prime content, upload audiobooks, make podcasts, and monetize their channel simpler than Youtube. Consumer and creator both can earn rewards or credits which they can invest in the same platform. Envesto also allows the user to get verified and become anEnvesto Pitch expert to provide master classes and any paid service.
Envesto wants users to get involved in investment and learning skills that really matter in life.
name: Envesto

idea:
WHO WE ARE

Digitwin Global Solutions LLP is a global Solutions and Services provider in Engineering, Geospatial and Healthcare services Company. With over 50 man-years of combined experience in the above fields and have experience of executing multi-locational, multi-discipline projects in over 40 countries around the world.

WHAT WE DO

Digitwin Global Solutions has extensive expertise in engineering design, geospatial, smart IOT, and digitalization touches every aspect of our lives, thus solving issues and delivering new services that promise to change the future. We specialize in disruptive technology such as Reverse Engineering, LaserScanning, Machine Learning (ML), Artificial Intelligence (AI), Big Data Analysis, Operational Technology (OT) and Digital Twins.

Our range of Services include Design, Detailed Engineering, EPCm Support, Utilities Planning, 3D City Modeling, Consulting Services, IT & OT, data management, Hospital Management, Diagnostic, Analytics Solutions and Business Process Outsourcing covering both Outbound/Inbound Voice/Non-Voice based Services.

WHO WE SERVE

Digitwin serves primarily the Oil & Gas, Refinery, Petrochemical, Fertilizer & Chemical, Pharmaceutical, Power, Water/Waste Water, Telecom, Electricity Distribution, Municipalities, Land Records, Agriculture, Infrastructure and Healthcare Sectors.
name: Digitwin Global Solutions
